name: Stainmml
description:
Hi there,   

Come discover our game : Stain.MML 

The goal is simple : 3 players are fighting each other to conquer all the pieces in the board

Just touch a piece to transform it into your color and the piece will also touch more pieces to help you ! 

Just watch out : when you touch a piece, it temporarily becomes a pirate and you must NEVER touch a pirate or you're dead :) 

Let us know when you finish the game, it's not that easy but we're sure you can do it :D 

ps : please give us lots of fruitful feedbacks to enhance our baby game ! It means a lot for us !
